name: Haceb
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, show me backyard camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can ask Alexa to control your Haceb products after connecting Alexa in a few simple steps:
(1) Download our “Haceb” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account at www.haceb.com).
(2) Configure your devices in “Haceb” app and change appropriate name for your devices.
(3) Enable “Haceb” voice skill, you'll be redirected to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
(4) Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”.
(5) Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on pet feeder.
Alexa, turn on the bedroom air conditioner.
Alexa, show me backyard camera.
Alexa, turn on the light.
Alexa, set the light to 50%.
Alexa, set the light to green.
